name: Jumpluff
description: Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores—it can even float around the world.

attacks.name: Mass Attack
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Leaf Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Jumpluff by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
